Class EmailPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupdocs.metadata.core.MetadataPackage
      • com.groupdocs.metadata.core.CustomPackage
        • com.groupdocs.metadata.core.EmailPackage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<MetadataProperty>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmlPackage, MsgPackage

    public abstract class EmailPackage
extends CustomPackage

    Represents email message metadata.

    Learn more

    • Working with saved Emails
